alert.note: Alert for Hill; Liberty; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:11AM MDT until July 18 at 5:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Liberty County in north central Montana... Northeastern Toole County in north central Montana... Northwestern Hill County in north central Montana... * Until 500 AM MDT. * At 410 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 18 miles northeast of Sunburst to 36 miles north of Lothair to 29 miles northwest of Joplin to 21 miles north of Chester, moving east northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Whitlash and Simpson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
